message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you want a fair deal Alice, but time is money! Let's make a move.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. This is a better deal for both of us than your last offer.
Alice, this offer is still better for you than the first round.  Let's be reasonable and close this out.
Bob, you're running out of time. This is a tiny improvement on my last offer, take it before inflation eats your share even more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point. Take it or leave it.
